title: Game Boy Advance - Super Games (by Adeath)
description:
My best selection of GBA games...
The torrent contains 3 GBA emulators:GBA, VBA, VBAlink(makes it posible to play like on a lan conection from 2 windows of VBAlink on the same computer[very usefull for pokemon]) and a PSX emulator for Breath of Fire 3 & 4.
_____________________________________________________

GBA Supergames:

#Breath of Fire(I; II; III*; IV*)     " * " =playable on PSX
#Dragon-Ball Z
 -Legacy of Goku(I; II)
 -Buu's Fury
#Final Fantasy
 - 1-2 Dawn of Souls
 - 4
 -  IV, V, VI (all Advance)
#Fire Emblem #Fire Emblem - The Sacred Stones
#Golden Sun
 -Final Battle
 -The Lost Age
#Legacy of Zelda
 -A Link to the Past
 -The Minish Cap
#Pokemon
 -Fire Red
 -Emerald
 -Red Rescue Team
#Shining Force
#Shining Soul (1 & 2)
#Summon Night #Summon Night Swordcraft Story 2
#Sonic Battle(RPG)
#Yu-Gi-Oh
 -Sacred Cards
 -Reshef of Destruction
#Zoids - Legacy
_______________________________________________

The games have massive RPG influence...
I don't "cry" for thanks like others, but I'm satisfied if you post here that the games are working or not, so I can see if something needs to be changed...and if you are seeding, of corse... these are more a thanks that words could ever say...

The files were scanned with Avast Antivirus Professional 4.8 latest edition.
